long_description: The Burton Jet snowboard boots offer a soft, lightweight and comfortable ride to the up-and-coming snowboarder. Shrinkage(TM) footprint reduction technology reduces the boots overall length by 1 size helping to eliminate toe drag. New Phantom linerless construction makes the boots extremely lightweight and comfortable, and easier to get on and off. Streamlined Speed Dial lacing system lets you twist your laces tight; laces are constantly fully engaged when tightening or loosening. Exit is easy with a quick pull of the dial-top loop. Soft-flexing, 3D molded tongues wrap the forefeet in comfort and offer a seamless flex. Snow-proof internal gusset keeps feet dry and comfortable. Molded EVA footbeds offer all-day comfort. DynoLite outsoles are lightweight yet offer consistent support and cushioning; soles provide great traction on varied terrain.
short_description: The Burton Jet snowboard boots offer a soft, lightweight and comfortable ride to the up-and-coming snowboarder.
